item.title: ETF IQ：谁真正需要杠杆巴菲特基金？
item.description: 欢迎收看 ETF IQ，这是一份专门报道 14 万亿美元全球 ETF 行业的周报。我是彭博新闻社记者兼主播凯蒂-格雷菲尔德（Katie Greifeld）。【原文：Welcome to ETF IQ, a weekly newsletter dedicated to the $14 trillion global ETF industry. I'm Bloomberg News reporter and anchor Katie Greifeld.】

item.title: 墨西哥将向墨西哥石油公司拨款 67 亿美元用于 2025 年债务偿还
item.description: 根据周五向国会提交的预算提案，墨西哥将向国有石油公司墨西哥石油公司（Petroleos Mexicanos）划拨 1 360 亿比索（67 亿美元），用于支付 2025 年的债务。【原文：Mexico will transfer 136 billion pesos ($6.7 billion) to state oil company Petroleos Mexicanos to cover debt payments in 2025, according to the budget proposal presented to Congress on Friday.】

item.title: 勇者斗恶龙》新重制版让 36 年前的游戏重新焕发活力
item.description:
《勇者斗恶龙III》制作人早坂正明（Masaaki Hayasaka）表示，他希望在未来看到更多的《勇者斗恶龙》翻拍

。【原文：

Dragon Quest III producer Masaaki Hayasaka says he’d like to see more Dragon Quest remakes in the future

】

item.title: 特朗普以白宫职位奖励极度网络推手
item.description: 2024 年 7 月 16 日星期二，佛罗里达州共和党众议员马特-盖茨（Matt Gaetz）在美国威斯康星州密尔沃基市费瑟夫论坛举行的共和党全国代表大会（RNC）上。前总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）任命JD-万斯（JD Vance）为他的竞选搭档，将这位由风险投资家转行而来的参议员推上了共和党总统候选人的宝座，他所拥护的民粹主义政治赢得了全国的关注，并使他成为共和党内一颗冉冉升起的新星。摄影师：Hannah Beier/布鲁姆伯格【原文：Representative Matt Gaetz, a Republican from Florida, during the Republican National Convention (RNC) at the Fiserv Forum in Milwaukee, Wisconsin, US, on Tuesday, July 16, 2024. Former President Donald Trump tapped JD Vance as his running mate, elevating to the Republican presidential ticket a venture capitalist-turned-senator whose embrace of populist politics garnered national attention and made him a rising star in the party. Photographer: Hannah Beier/Bloomberg】

item.title: 由 SVP 支持的 Kloeckner 测试投资者对 20 亿欧元债务计划的需求
item.description: 由 Strategic Value Partners 支持的包装公司 Kloeckner Pentaplast 正在向投资者募集约 20 亿欧元（21 亿美元）的资金，用于债务再融资。【原文：Packaging company Kloeckner Pentaplast, backed by Strategic Value Partners, is reaching out to investors to raise about €2 billion ($2.1 billion) of capital to refinance its debt load.】

item.title: 为毒品洗钱的比特币 "混混 "被判 3 年监禁
item.description: 俄亥俄州一名男子为毒贩和其他罪犯清洗了 3 亿多美元的比特币，因帮助美国起诉其他加密货币案件而获得法官宽大处理，被判处三年监禁。【原文：An Ohio man who laundered more than $300 million of Bitcoin on behalf of drug traffickers and other criminals was sentenced to three years in prison, after a judge granted him leniency for helping the US prosecute other cryptocurrency cases.】

item.title: 墨西哥公布 2025 年预算提案，缩小财政赤字
item.description: 墨西哥政府周五表示，明年将缩小财政赤字，总统克劳迪娅-谢因鲍姆（Claudia Sheinbaum）也承诺将加强社会计划并支持负债累累的墨西哥石油公司（Petroleos Mexicanos）。【原文：Mexico’s government said on Friday that it will narrow the fiscal deficit next year even as President Claudia Sheinbaum pledges to boost social programs and support the indebted state driller Petroleos Mexicanos.】

item.title: 纽约工厂反映特朗普乐观情绪，关税前订单跃升
item.description: 自美国大选以来的首批商业调查之一显示，人们对经济前景持乐观态度，同时出现了大量订单，这可能反映出人们在努力备货，以防当选总统唐纳德-特朗普提高进口关税。【原文：One of the first business surveys since the US election showed optimism about the economic outlook as well as a rush of orders that may reflect efforts to stock up in case President-elect Donald Trump raises tariffs on imports.】

item.title: 安哥拉 12 月未售出石油预示中国需求减弱
item.description: 12月装船的安哥拉石油销售速度比往常慢，约三分之一的船货仍在寻找买家。【原文：The selling pace of Angolan oil for December-loading is slower than usual, with about a third of the shipments still seeking buyers.】

item.title: 监督机构称，特鲁多削减移民人数将缩小住房缺口
item.description: 据一家预算监督机构称，贾斯汀-特鲁多总理限制新移民流入的计划将缩小该国住房供需之间的差距。【原文：Prime Minister Justin Trudeau’s plan to restrict inflows of newcomers will narrow the country’s gap between housing supply and demand, according to a budget watchdog.】

item.title: 想结识百万富翁？最好的机会就在旧金山地区
item.description: 根据对 ADP 薪资数据的最新分析，旧金山每 200 名工人中就有超过一人年收入至少 100 万美元，是全美年收入最高的城市。【原文：More than one in 200 workers in San Francisco earns at least $1 million a year, the highest share in the country by quite a distance, according to a new analysis of ADP payroll data.】

item.title: 马克龙将于 12 月初前往利雅得进行国事访问
item.description: 埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）总统的一位助手说，马克龙将于 12 月初前往利雅得进行国事访问。【原文：Emmanuel Macron will travel to Riyadh for a state visit in early December, an aide to the president said.】

item.title: 美联储称银行提高资本以应对商业地产的进一步损失
item.description: 美联储周五在其一年两次的监管报告中称，美国银行在 2024 年上半年增加了信贷储备，以防止商业房地产和部分消费贷款造成进一步损失。【原文：US banks added to credit reserves in the first half of 2024 to protect against further losses from commercial real estate and some consumer loans, the Federal Reserve said in its twice-yearly supervision and regulation report Friday.】

item.title: 秘鲁九月份经济增长速度超过预期
item.description: 由于经济继续从去年的衰退中强劲反弹，秘鲁 9 月份的增长速度超过预期。【原文：Peru posted faster than expected growth in September, as economy continues to bounce back strongly from last year’s recession.】

item.title: 美联储主席柯林斯称 12 月仍将降息
item.description: 波士顿联邦储备银行行长苏珊-柯林斯（Susan Collins）表示，12 月份的降息仍在考虑之中，并强调央行的决定将以即将公布的数据为指导。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Boston President Susan Collins said a December interest-rate cut remains on the table, emphasizing the central bank’s decision will be guided by incoming data.】

item.title: 毛里求斯任命前财政部长西塔宁为中央银行行长
item.description: 毛里求斯总统普里特维拉金-罗蓬（Prithvirajsing Roopun）任命拉玛-克里希纳-西塔宁（Rama Krishna Sithanen）为中央银行行长。【原文：Mauritius’s President Prithvirajsing Roopun named Rama Krishna Sithanen central bank governor.】

item.title: 泽连斯基告诉《怀疑论报》，在特朗普领导下乌克兰战争将更快结束
item.description: 据 Suspilne 网站报道，乌克兰总统沃洛德梅尔-泽连斯基告诉 Suspilne 媒体平台，在美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普的领导下，乌克兰战争将更快结束。【原文：Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy tells Suspilne media platform that under US president-elect Donald Trump the war in Ukraine will end quicker, according to Suspilne website.】

item.title: 西波罗内称，欧洲央行政策不应过于紧缩
item.description: 欧洲中央银行执行董事会成员皮埃罗-西波罗内（Piero Cipollone）说，欧洲中央银行必须确保利率不要过高，以免对欧元区经济造成永久性损害。【原文：The European Central Bank must make sure not to keep interest rates too high to avoid inflicting permanent damage on the euro-area economy, Executive Board member Piero Cipollone said.】

item.title: 特朗普获胜，美元创二月以来最佳连胜纪录
item.description: 美元有望实现连续第七周上涨，这是自二月份以来最长的连涨期，因为交易员们加大了赌注，认为当选总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易和其他政策将支持美元。【原文：The dollar is on pace to post its seventh consecutive weekly gain, its longest winning streak since February, as traders add to wagers that trade and other policies under President-elect Donald Trump will support the US currency.】

item.title: 中国暂停热门交易平台增加新客户
item.description: 中国市场监督管理局责令 Hithink RoyalFlush 信息网络有限公司暂停其投资咨询服务部门新增客户三个月，因为其直播业务不符合证券法规。【原文：China’s market watchdog ordered Hithink RoyalFlush Information Network Co. to suspend its investment advisory service unit from adding new clients for three months as its live streaming business failed to comply with the securities rules.】

item.title: 俄罗斯暂时限制向美国供应浓缩铀
item.description: 俄罗斯政府周五表示，俄罗斯将暂时限制向美国出口浓缩铀。【原文：Russia will temporarily limit exports of enriched uranium to the US, the government said on Friday.】

item.title: 纽瓦克机场空中列车成本增加 70% 至 35 亿美元
item.description: 纽瓦克自由国际机场期待已久的列车系统已经超出预算 14.5 亿美元，达到 35 亿美元。【原文：Newark Liberty International Airport’s long-awaited train system has blown past its budget by $1.45 billion to $3.5 billion.】

item.title: 特朗普加征关税在即，习近平警告不要 "走回头路
item.description: 中国国家主席习近平在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）赢得美国总统大选后发表的首次重要讲话中，警告美国不要试图解除全球化，并威胁要对世界第二大经济体征收高达 60% 的关税。【原文：Chinese President Xi Jinping warned against any efforts to unwind globalization in his first major remarks since Donald Trump won the US presidential election after threatening to impose tariffs as high as 60% on the world’s second-biggest economy.】

item.title: 贝宁将首次进入全球碳市场
item.description: 贝宁正准备首次利用全球碳市场来帮助满足其气候融资需求。【原文：Benin is preparing to tap global carbon markets for the first time to help meet its climate-financing needs.】

item.title: 俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司将从 11 月 16 日起停止向奥地利输送天然气
item.description: 由于奥地利 OMV AG 公司称俄罗斯将从周六起减少天然气供应，欧洲天然气价格跳涨。【原文：European gas prices jumped as Austria’s OMV AG said Russia will cut deliveries from Saturday.】

item.title: 加拿大房屋销售 "十月惊喜"，买家大量回流
item.description: 由于央行的一系列降息措施开始吸引买家重返市场，加拿大的房屋销售量升至两年多来的最高水平。【原文：Canadian home sales rose to their highest level in more than two years as a string of interest rate cuts by the central bank started to draw buyers back to the market.】

item.title: 替代品成本高昂，捷克人重拾俄罗斯天然气
item.description: 过去两年来，欧洲一直在努力摆脱对俄罗斯能源的依赖，但更昂贵的替代能源正促使一些内陆国家重拾旧日能源来源。【原文：Europe has spent the past two years trying to free itself from dependence on Russian energy, but more expensive alternatives are prompting some landlocked countries to go back to their old source.】

item.title: 特朗普胜选后，里昂证券策略师看好印度股市而非中国股市
item.description: 里昂证券的策略师扭转了对中国股市的战术性增持，并增持了印度股市，理由是美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普上台后，贸易紧张局势有可能卷土重来。【原文：CLSA strategists reversed a tactical overweight on Chinese stocks and added to India, citing the risk of resurgent trade tensions when US President-elect Donald Trump takes office.】

item.title: 美国工业生产因罢工和飓风影响而下降
item.description: 由于波音公司机械师罢工和两次飓风的影响，美国 10 月份的工业生产连续第二个月出现下降。【原文：US industrial production declined in October as the impacts from a Boeing Co. machinists’ strike and a pair of hurricanes reverberated through manufacturing for a second month.】

item.title: 德国肖尔茨与俄罗斯普京电话讨论乌克兰问题
item.description: 据一位不愿透露姓名的知情人士称，德国总理奥拉夫-肖尔茨周五与俄罗斯总统普京通了电话，讨论了如何结束乌克兰战争。【原文：German Chancellor Olaf Scholz spoke with Russian President Vladimir Putin by phone on Friday and discussed how to end the war in Ukraine, according to a person familiar with the matter who spoke on the condition of anonymity.】
